attributes.action: allow licence fee payers when renewing their licence to indicate whether they wish the fee to be used for funding the BBC or another public service broadcaster in the same way that Union members are allowed to indicate whether they wish their subscriptions to be used for the political fund or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has been paying less and less notice to the concerns voiced by viewers on many subjects and the fact that the amount of funding that they receive is in the hands of the fee payers themselves may make them take more notice or the viewers and their wishes.

rejection.details: Your title should be a single, clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
